laboratory_examinations.findings: Severe thrombocytopenia with PLT count less than 15,000 and moderate neutropenia.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Prior CBC showed only mild normocytic anemia with Hb 10.0.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Progressively hypo-cellular marrow with decreased megakaryocytes, consistent with either hypo-plastic MDS vs aplastic anemia.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Findings most consistent with either hypo-plastic MDS vs aplastic anemia due to lack of overt dysplasia.
